mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Slow Poke". SPECIAL FEATURES "So You're Planning a Festival", "Phrasing", "Summer Institutes", and "Featuring a Square Dance Personality". REGULAR FEATURES "As I See It", "The Square of the Month: Jack McKay", "On Tour with Terry", "'Round the Outside Ring", "The Green Sheet", "On the Record", "From the Floor", "Help! For Your Square Dance Club", and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
